sourcesContent:
import { Component,Renderer2 } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sidebar', templateUrl: './sidebar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sidebar.component.css'] }) export class SidebarComponent { isDropdownOpen = false; constructor(private renderer: Renderer2) {} toggleDropdown() { this.isDropdownOpen = !this.isDropdownOpen; const dropdownMenu = this.renderer.selectRootElement('#employeesDropdown + .dropdown-menu'); if (this.isDropdownOpen) { this.renderer.addClass(dropdownMenu, 'show'); } else { this.renderer.removeClass(dropdownMenu, 'show'); } } }
